product_name: The North Face Recon Pack - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Recon Pack for women takes you on towering summit adventures or everyday urban adventures to work and school. Injection-molded shoulder straps create flex zones to alleviate clavicle hot spots, pressure points and neck strain. Comfortable back panel features an improved fit with a recessed channel that helps take pressure off your spine. Padded hipbelt can be stowed out of the way when not in use. Panel-loading main compartment offers plenty of room for gear and clothing, or books and binders. Rear padded compartment protects laptop during the commute; it doubles as a hydration pocket with drinking tube exit port (reservoir not included). Padded compartment fits most 15 in. laptops. Front compartment with organizer helps keep track of pens/pencils, wallet, cell phone, electronics and other daily essentials. Front stash pocket with water-resistant zipper stows small necessities. Front mesh pocket closes with a buckle to securely hold a bike helmet or jacket. Dual side mesh pockets with cordlocks keep water bottles from bouncing around. The North Face Recon Pack features side compression straps and an angled bottom panel that lifts up contents, helping to position the pack's load higher on your back. This pack is endorsed by the American Chiropractic Association, recognizing the comfort and function of its shoulder straps, back panel and interior organization. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Recon Pack for women takes you on towering summit adventures or everyday urban adventures to work and school.
